title: Hacked by [REMOVED]
body: Ok so basically this person has hacked me and has put a really bad score against my name of 0/44/3 as kalista in the JUNGLE, I do not know how many times I have been reported in that game. He has also changed all my runes and masteries. This person has also removed or blocked all my friends and has spend the leftover of my rp. I hope this person can be dealt with in some manner. His summoner name is: [REMOVED] and mine is Godfuzzy86

replies.body:
You need to make a [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ticket ASAP!

It looks like this guy was trying to ruin your account, so there's a good chance he might have even scripted. I don't want to scare you but scripts can get your account permanently banned, which is why it's so important you head over to Riot Support and let them know before anything happens.

You should submit your ticket in the _"I need help recovering my account."_ section.

Good luck!
